title: font used in a website
content:
can anyone help me identify the font used in this website [http://www.mint.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042626/http:/www.mint.com/ "http://www.mint.com/"), where it says “the best way to manage your money”?

thnank you!!

 [‹ The Bowery Hotel - need help IDing font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042626/http:/typophile.com/node/49626 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help would be greatly appreciated. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042626/http:/typophile.com/node/49504 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Lirak

comments.content:
Hi Lirak,

it’s [Hypatia Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042626/http:/www.adobe.com/type/browser/landing/hypatia/hypatia.html) by [Thomas Phinney](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042626/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%252BPhinney).  
AFAIK, Hypatia Sans is currently only available as a registration incentive with Adobe CS3.  
F
